alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; Pennington; West Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 11:19PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Marshall, north central Polk and northwestern Pennington Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1119 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Radium, or 26 miles northwest of Thief River Falls, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Warren, Viking, Rosewood, Radium, Old Mill State Park and Carpenters Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
